TextView.android:text: Has the baby had any danger sign, complication, problem or disease since birth?
Kya bachay ko kisi kisam k khatray k aalamat ya koi masla howa pidaish sa ab tak
Which danger sign, complication, problem or disease, has the baby had?
\n Bachay ko khatray k kon c aalamaat ya masla howa
4. Sans ma masla ya/taiz taiz sans ana
8. Thakan ya koi harkat na hona
11. Naaf wali jaga par laal nishan ya wahan sa khuch nikalna
14. Moun aur zeban par zakham hona
16. Redness of eyes or watery discharge
16. Ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani ana
18. Lips / tongue turning blue or black
18. Zeban aur hount kalay ya neelay ho jana
19. Haat ya paoun neelay par jana
Has the baby been taken to any health facility for care since birth?
Pidaish k baad sa ab tak bachay ko kisi sehat k markaz lay kar jana para
From where was the treatment received?
Did the baby receive any treatment during this period?
Is doran bachay ko koi ilaj diya gaya
\n Kya ilaj diya gaya bachay ko
2. Deewai di gay teekay k zariya
3. Deewai di gay moun k zariya
5. Oxygen was given through bag, tube or mask
5. Oxygen lagi nali ya bag k zariya
7. Baby was kept on NG feed
7. Bachay ko khorak k nali lagay gay
8. Some other medicine not powdered one
8. Koi aur deewai di gay, powder wali deewai k ilawa
For how long was the baby admitted?
Bacha agr hospital ma raha tu kitnay din
What is the state of baby health according to the family?
App k mutabiq bachay k sehat ab kaisi ha

RadioButton.android:text: Recovered from illness (beemari dur ho gay)
Still ill, but better than before (abhi bh beemar ha laikin pehlay sa behtar ha)
Condition has deteriorated (tabiyat aur kharan ho gay)
